name: European Dairy Association aisbl
membership: EDA is a member of FoodDrink Europe
goal: EDA is the representative body of the milk processing industry (cooperative & private owned) in Europe and we voice the interests of the European dairy industry in Brussels, Europe & beyond.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
- CAP
- Food law (labelling, food safety, hygiene, additives, etc) animal health and welfare,
- health & nutrition
- Trade
- Sustainability & Environment
